metoffice.title: Yellow warning of thunderstorm affecting South West England
metoffice.summary: Yellow warning of thunderstorm affecting South West England: Bath and North East Somerset, Bournemouth Christchurch and Poole, Bristol, Devon, Dorset, Gloucestershire, North Somerset, Somerset, South Gloucestershire, Swindon, Wiltshire valid from 0702 Sun 07 Sep to 1100 Sun 07 Sep

heat.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.

cold.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.
